businessCases.name: Change of Contract
businessCases.openingQuestion:
When you move we need your new address and some details for your household insurance.
 If you want you can simply send us a photo of the new rental contract.

entities.name: street
entities.question: What is the new street name and number?

entities.name: zip
entities.question: What is the new zip code?

entities.name: city
entities.question: In which city will you live?

entities.name: area
entities.question: How large is the new home in square meters?

entities.name: date
entities.question: When will you move into your new home?
